channel.title: Game of The Year if it could!!! :D
channel.description: Guys you did an amazing job with this, I'm not done with the game yet and I'm am stunned with all the amazing detail that is in this game. Everything about this game is great, I have no problems with bugs or any graphical issue's. I'm still stunned that this was made by a group of people that simply wanted to make one of the greatest FPS's even better than before. You guys have taken the Source Engine to a whole another level. Very Nice Work!!!! :slight_smile: :slight_smile: :slight_smile:

item.title: Game of The Year if it could!!! :D
item.dc:creator: Alx
item.description:
Indeed, the amount of work that must’ve gone into this gives me a headache.

Seriously awesome.

Read full topic

item.description:

The amount of love and attention to detail in Black Mesa is staggering.

item.source: Game of The Year if it could!!! :D

item.title: Game of The Year if it could!!! :D
item.dc:creator: Mutto
item.description:
Mod of the Year maybe…(and this is NOT to take away from any of the AMAZING work this team did) there are, however, other mods out there that I believe would be equally worthy of the award. This one will get more attention because Half Life is established, and it deserves the attention, but it will definitely overshadow other great mods.

Read full topic
item.source: Game of The Year if it could!!! :D

item.title: Game of The Year if it could!!! :D
item.dc:creator: Sentinelrv
item.description:
Can a game only receive a GOTY award if it’s commerical? They might have to make an exception for Black Mesa. This is something very rare that may not happen again for a long time.

item.title: Game of The Year if it could!!! :D
item.dc:creator: DarknessDudeTOB
item.description:
I would agree. Everything about this game felt like a triple A title. I had more fun with this MOD than fucking Battlefield or Call of Duty. That’s how good it is.

item.title: Game of The Year if it could!!! :D
item.dc:creator: LtSlipknot
item.description:
Guys you did an amazing job with this, I’m not done with the game yet and I’m am stunned with all the amazing detail that is in this game. Everything about this game is great, I have no problems with bugs or any graphical issue’s. I’m still stunned that this was made by a group of people that simply wanted to make one of the greatest FPS’s even better than before. You guys have taken the Source Engine to a whole another level. Very Nice Work!!!
